resources.string: In this app you will be presented with a 6 question quiz. For each question you will be presented with a state and your job is to select the capital city of that state from the 3 choices that will be presented to you. Once you are happy with your choice, swipe left to move to the next question. Once all 6 questions have been answered you will be given your final score. Past quiz results are saved and can be viewed by selecting the \"View Past Quiz\" button below. Press \"Take a Quiz\" to begin your quiz!
